title: Road construction is not proper
description: I have noticed a problem in road construction near the main junction. The quality of work is substandard and poses safety risks.

title: Street Light Not Working
description: The street light on Oak Avenue has been non-functional for over a week, creating safety concerns for pedestrians and drivers.

title: Pothole on Main Street
description: Large pothole near the grocery store parking lot causing vehicle damage. Immediate attention required.

title: Garbage Collection Issue
description: Garbage has not been collected in our neighborhood for 3 days. Bins are overflowing and attracting pests.
